Accreditation.Title: Accreditation
Accreditation.DeclarationTitle: Before you begin, you are going to need the following:
Accreditation.FundProof: Bank Statement or Fund Proof of no less than US$20,000 (Less than 3 months old)
Accreditation.Webcam: Working Web-Cam on your device for facial recognition

Accreditation.CompletedTitle: Thank you for submitting your verification to us
Accreditation.CompletedText: We are currently processing your submission. We will send out a email confirmation, once your account has been approved. You may also check the status of your account verification at   'My Account'   Page. Thank you.
